kv22.8:1.3_0: Citte mahāpathavī saṇṭhāti, mahāsamuddo saṇṭhāti, sinerupabbatarājā saṇṭhāti, āpo saṇṭhāti, tejo saṇṭhāti, vāyo saṇṭhāti, tiṇakaṭṭhavanappatayo saṇṭhahantīti?
kv22.8:2.8_0: “ajjhattikañceva, āvuso, cakkhuṁ aparibhinnaṁ hoti, bāhirā ca rūpā na āpāthaṁ āgacchanti, no ca tajjo samannāhāro hoti, neva tāva tajjassa viññāṇabhāgassa pātubhāvo hoti.
kv22.8:2.9_0: Ajjhattikañceva, āvuso, cakkhuṁ aparibhinnaṁ hoti, bāhirā ca rūpā āpāthaṁ āgacchanti, no ca tajjo samannāhāro hoti, neva tāva tajjassa viññāṇabhāgassa pātubhāvo hoti.
kv22.8:2.10_0: Yato ca kho, āvuso, ajjhattikañceva cakkhuṁ aparibhinnaṁ hoti, bāhirā ca rūpā āpāthaṁ āgacchanti, tajjo ca samannāhāro hoti, evaṁ tajjassa viññāṇabhāgassa pātubhāvo hotī”ti.
kv22.8:3.9_0: “ajjhattiko ceva, āvuso, kāyo aparibhinno hoti, bāhirā ca phoṭṭhabbā na āpāthaṁ āgacchanti, no ca …pe…
kv22.8:3.10_0: ajjhattiko ceva, āvuso, kāyo aparibhinno hoti, bāhirā ca phoṭṭhabbā āpāthaṁ āgacchanti, no ca …pe…
kv22.8:3.11_0: yato ca kho, āvuso, ajjhattiko ceva kāyo aparibhinno hoti, bāhirā ca phoṭṭhabbā āpāthaṁ āgacchanti, tajjo ca samannāhāro hoti, evaṁ tajjassa viññāṇabhāgassa pātubhāvo hotī”ti.
kv22.8:4.4_0: Sabbe dhammā niccā dhuvā sassatā avipariṇāmadhammāti?
